body.title: The mobile construction app built for the field
body.description: Make critical decisions faster with one mobile construction app for **Autodesk Build**, **Autodesk BIM Collaborate**, **Autodesk BIM Collaborate Pro** and **Autodesk Docs**.

body.subtitle: Manage the jobsite and the office with one construction management app.

description.markdown: Access the following products with the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app

image.altText: Autodesk Build isometric drawing of a building under construction.

cards.description: Improve construction management and empower all builders with connected teams, workflows, and data

image.altText: Autodesk PlanGrid Build isometric of field construction on the go.

cards.description: Centralize document management for a single source of truth across the project lifecycle for all project teams.

image.altText: Autodesk BIM Collaborate isometric drawing of construction collaboration.

cards.description: Connect decision-makers and construction teams to manage design reviews and automate model coordination with trades.

image.altText: Autodesk BIM Collaborate isometric drawing of construction collaboration.

cards.description: Co-author designs, perform design reviews, and automate model coordination with trades in the office and the field.

body.fontFamily: Artifakt Legend,Arial,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif,"Apple Color Emoji","Segoe UI Emoji","Segoe UI Symbol"

body.title: Work with project data easily on site

features.description: Find information with quick sheet viewing and intuitive model navigation.
Call attention to project updates, changes, and critical information across projects.
Sync project data and enjoy access to information offline.
Create and view all design, quality, and safety issues.
Create an RFI and get notified when your question is answered.
Complete all safety, quality, and daily reports.
Share project context through photographs from the job site.

body.quote: The ability to access 3D models from the field eliminates confusion and allows us to come to a real-time resolution for any issues onsite. This capability reduces risk and provides cost and time-savings while ensuring we deliver high-quality projects to our clients.
body.attribution: Briana Mitchell, Project Manager at The Boldt Company

body.headline: Unlock the potential of a unified construction management app.

body.fontFamily: Artifakt Legend,Arial,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif,"Apple Color Emoji","Segoe UI Emoji","Segoe UI Symbol"

description.markdown: ### Construction Management Mobile App Frequently Asked Questions

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Does Autodesk Construction Cloud have a mobile application?

expandedContent.markdown: Yes, the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app is available on the [iOS App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/plangrid-construction-software/id498795789) and [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.plangrid.android&hl=en_US&gl=US).

accordionSections.sectionTitle: What products are accessible by the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application on job sites?

expandedContent.markdown: Autodesk Build, Autodesk Docs, Autodesk BIM Collaborate, Autodesk BIM Collaborate Pro, and PlanGrid  are available via the mobile application.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Where can I download the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application?

expandedContent.markdown: The Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app is available on the [iOS App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/plangrid-construction-software/id498795789) and [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.plangrid.android&hl=en_US&gl=US).

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Can I use Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application to view drawings and 3D models?

expandedContent.markdown: Yes, the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app can view 2D drawings and 3D models from the field.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Can I use Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app to create markups?

expandedContent.markdown: Yes, the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app can create markups in the field.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Can I use Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application to create issues?

expandedContent.markdown: The Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app can create or log issues on site for design collaboration, quality, or safety workflows.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Can I use Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application to fill out checklists/punch lists or perform site walk-throughs?

expandedContent.markdown: Whether pre-functional tests, safety observations, or quality inspections, the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application is able to use the Forms tool to provide checklists.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Can Autodesk Construction Clouds mobile construction app integrate with other construction software or tools?

expandedContent.markdown: Autodesk Construction Cloud has over 260 different integration partners across the platform which help connect data from design through handover. These integrations help teams optimize technology processes and streamline collaboration with all project stakeholders.

accordionSections.sectionTitle: Are any training or support resources available for the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app?

expandedContent.markdown: Autodesk offers a variety of support resources to help you get the most out of its mobile construction app. The [Autodesk Help Site ](https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=About_ACC_App)provides helpful support, documentation, tutorials, videos, and user forums all in one convenient location.

metaData.title: Autodesk Construction Cloud Mobile | Construction Management App
metaData.description: Make critical decisions faster with an integrated mobile construction app for Autodesk Construction Cloud, including Autodesk Build, BIM Collaborate, BIM Collaborate Pro, and Docs.
